item.title: Basics of the github workflow for a single user
item.description: In an earlier blog article, I wrote down some git workflow involved to in making this github page site (https://shuod.github.io/post/first/). And here, I will briefly write down a memo of github workflow for a single user. It is similar to git or gitlab workflow but more proper for the single user scenario. I assume you had setup an account on “github.com” and also a new project on github. â€‹ The streamline of github workflow is like this:
